ygData.subject: My 2 cents in magery specialization & Report on Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: I dump 1 point each on evoke, adjure, conjure, alter and divin.  Initially I didnt specifically train them until I heard from some players tat the benefits
ygData.messageBody:
I dump 1 point each on evoke, adjure, conjure, alter and divin. Initially
I didnt specifically train them until I heard from some players tat the
benefits (faster casting time and less failure) only start come in when ya
skill reach 50. So I spend one afternoon casting the lowest lvl evoke
spell on myself, med, cast, med, cast....until I reach 50 (very boring).
Then I leave it alone. Some players said once a particular skill reach
50, it means it will be your primary specialization, dunno how true it is
coz the other 4 spec con't to rise even my evoke is already above 50. The
lvl ceiling still apply I guess. so probably I will spend another night
trying to max evoke spec out.

Ziltus.




On Monday, 19 July, 1999 10:00 PM, Synzzz [SMTP:hannibal@...]
wrote:
> Hi Everyone,
>
> I would like to thank all of you who have provided info/tips and much
guidance on the game.
> Thanks especially to Ziltus,Flyingfox for bringing me to FP and also to
Sereph (and uh that Ae*** person..hehe..)for having
> brought me to Oasis. It was a great place for me as i went up 2 levels
from 14 to 16 pretty quickly there. Much thanks
> Sereph for having helped me gain that last bubble to 16 hehe..as a yellow
DW Caiman certainly helps with exp.
>
> I got killed twice by SGs so far...one spawned on me i think and another
was trained by someone running past me. Hell..
> almost got killed by a Spectre once too! Lucky i Gated while pet tanked
it!
>
> On to spell research...i know it's gonna be tough road from now on having
to research...but i think it's only
> summoning spells right? (i hope!) I don't mean to be a smart aleck but i
think lvl 16 and lvl20 pet spells can be bought
> but beyond that..probably unlikely. Dunno about that though..Thanks
though to FF and Sereph for having
> informed me of the tough road ahead. At least i'll be mentally
prepared..sigh..
>
> Any ideas on practice points though? I've saved up about 50 practice
points..not sure what to use them for right now.
> Thinking of keeping them for specialization? Hmm..any comments?
>
> I've been in Oasis for awhile..but i was wondering..which mobs there are
good for looting? I need more money..i'm down
> to only 45 pp now!! Getting poor again. The orcs there any good? Only
found one bronze weapon on them so far..but i've been
> perhaps abit cautious in my attacks as i'm still soloing.
>
> Thanks once again and Good Hunting!
>
> Zanderion (lvl 16 mage)
>
